nodes.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
nodes.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving
nodes.author: Anika Mehrotra

nodes.title: Kbee - Turn Google Drive into a wiki or help center

nodes.excerpt: Focus on what matters, from small tasks to life goals: - Spend your time doing things and reaching your goals - Stop wasting your time classifying things or measuring productivity. Minimalist and delightful design. No sign up. No ads. No data collected.
nodes.title: Listed - The minimalist app for your to-dos & notes

nodes.excerpt: A comprehensive tool for ensuring that Applicant Tracking Systems (ATSs) and other automatic filtering systems can accurately read you CV and extract text from it. Your CV will only progress to a human reviewer if a machine can read it properly.
nodes.title: e-Read My CV - Test if machine can parse your CV and read its content

nodes.excerpt: Scale database resources in and out on demand to match application requirements and traffic so that you pay only for what you use. Runs on every cloud with developer GraphQL, REST, JSON, CQL APIs. $25 usage credits per month.
nodes.title: Astra Serverless Database - An on-demand database for supercharging your next project

nodes.excerpt: Litmaps lets you navigate the scientific literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks. Create a literature map, discover new articles, and export your discoveries, to advance your research project.
nodes.title: Litmaps - Search scientific literature with interactive citations map

nodes.excerpt: Drink Map is a small app that helps you log the places in which you have drunk. By pressing the only real button available, "Raise the jug", you'll mark your location. Learn a new fact every time you use the app on the DID YOU KNOW? section!
nodes.title: Drink Map - Mark places where you have drunk
nodes.author: Unai Sanchez

nodes.excerpt: Keka wants to be an easy to use little app, well integrated in macOS and very powerful. And it is. You can compress files in all common (and not that common) formats and uncompress almost every format file, with and without encryption.
nodes.title: Keka - The macOS file archiver

nodes.excerpt: Beam makes it easy to get paid to text your biggest fans. Send premium paid content, images, or videos directly to your monthly paying subscribers.

nodes.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
nodes.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers

nodes.excerpt: Eco puts your money back to work for you. It's a single balance that lets you spend, send, save and make money at the same time. Earn 2.5-5% on your balance, plus get 5% cashback at merchants. And, soon, pay bills and send money to friends for more rewards.
nodes.title: The Eco App - One simple balance for saving, spending, and making money.

nodes.excerpt: Over 20% of females struggle with a hormone-related issue such as PCOS, endometriosis, or amenorrhea. Pollie is your friend at every step of your hormonal health journey, from finding your best-fit specialist to symptom tracking.
nodes.title: Pollie - Hormonal health, simplified

nodes.excerpt: Allfactor is the leading market analytics platform that provides data-driven solutions for ecommerce brands to thrive in the industry. The tools enable sellers to optimize product offering, track performance, and conduct competitive analysis across platforms.
nodes.title: Allfactor Analytics - The leading market analytics platform for data e-commerce

nodes.excerpt: This app is used for writing copy for marketing purposes, such as website content or blog posts. This copy can be customized and unique to each client and can be used immediately on your website. The app uses artificial intelligence (AI) to write amazing copy.
nodes.title: Exty Solutions - AI copywriting that writes everything for you within a click
